turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to place an order for pickup from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want one iced cherry mocha.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like to add any milk?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what size would you like that in?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, which location would you like to pick up from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one in Union Avenue in Memphis, Tennessee.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you are ordering a tall iced cherry mocha with coconut milk to be picked up at the starbucks on union avenue, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your drink will be ready in 5 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help with anything else?
